Module contents¶

ip_reveal.tools.commify(num)[source]¶

Add commas in their necessary places to provided integer. Returns result as a string.

Parameters

num (int) – An integer you’d like returned with commas

Returns

The integer (as a string) that you provided with commas added.

Return type

(str)
